fr.lri.swingstates.animations

Class AnimationOutlinePaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.animations.Animation
      • fr.lri.swingstates.animations.AnimationOutlinePaint

  • public class AnimationOutlinePaint
extends Animation
    An animation that changes the outline color of a CElement to a given color smoothly by refreshing every 40 milliseconds.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

        public Animation setAnimatedElement(CElement ce)
